message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm hoping we can make a deal. I'm asking for $15,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $12,000?
